title: Is A Girlfriend Who Can’t Say “I Love You” No Good? Houkage-san Reads Light Novels Too Much - Novel Updates
author: Gangudou   玩具堂
description:
The silent “I love you” will inevitably kill you with cuteness! A slightly mysterious coming-of-age romantic comedy!

Wordless, expressionless, emotionless! A young girl who has all three of these points! Aramaki Tenta will definitely confess his feelings to Houkage.

“Lovers… I don’t really understand, but if that’s fine,”

And thus a relationship with an ambiguous yet successful reply was supposed to begin, but……>
